casebody.data:
Fred COHEN, executor of the estate of Dennis Alan O'Neal, deceased, and Fred Cohen, executor of the estate of Debra Dee O'Neal, deceased, Plaintiff,
v.
CONTINENTAL MOTORS, INC. (f/k/a Teledyne Continental Motors, Inc. and/or Teledyne Continental Motors); Teledyne Technologies, Inc.; Air Care Aviation Services, Inc.; Air-Care, Inc. (d/b/a Air Care, Inc.); and Aircraft Accessories of Oklahoma, Inc., Defendants. No. COA16-792 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: May 2, 2017

AFFIRMED.
